attributes.action: Uphold the european working time directive in private nursing home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make sure that ALL UK workers are protected by the Working time directive of having 11 hours clear from leaving the place of work to returning to it, unlike the private nursing homes for the elderly where current shift patterens treat this directive with comptemt. The rules are their to protect people, but are never upheld, as simple check by the care commission of shift patterens would be all that was required to see just how    these regulations are breached so often
